name: Untitled Tower Defense Builder
description:
Prototype.

m1 for quick attack
m2 for heavy attack (hold) and to comfirm build placement
E to quick build
WASD for movement
esc to cancel build
C to destroy buildings in front of you

The goal is to keep your starting green tower alive, ill add a real game over screen soon

Update List: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1JLYbKY8SiBEwjyx31X9O7I_RoR7rzsDLFVzlzkSuVp4/...
